Package tiger.command

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiger.command.Command
  • public class Command
extends java.lang.Object
    The Command class handles deciding which command the user input corresponds to, and is responsible for return an Action class that can be executed to run that command.

      • getActionFromCommand

        public static Action getActionFromCommand​(java.lang.String command,
                                          AppState applicationState)
                                   throws TigerInvalidInputException
        Gets the desired Action class from the user command.
        Parameters:
        command - String of user input.
        applicationState - The current application state.
        Returns:
        An Action object.
        Throws:
        TigerInvalidInputException - if the user input is invalid.
